name: Minicraft for PSP
tagline: Playstation Portable port of Notch's Minicraft
body:
![minicraft_preview](https://raw2.github.com/konchunas/minicraft-psp/gh-pages/images/minicraft_preview.png)
Minicraft for PSP
=============

Playstation Portable port of Notch's game for Ludum Dare 22. It is top-down Zelda-like Minecraft little brother. Chop trees by hands, craft weapons and fight monsters. Make your way to the deepest dungeon and get back to the skies to kill mighty Air Wizard!

Screenshots
===========

![sreenshot1](https://raw2.github.com/konchunas/minicraft-psp/gh-pages/images/screenshot1.png)
  Some furniture

![sreenshot2](https://raw2.github.com/konchunas/minicraft-psp/gh-pages/images/screenshot2.png)
  Crafting menu

![sreenshot3](https://raw2.github.com/konchunas/minicraft-psp/gh-pages/images/screenshot3.png)
  Fighting a zombie

![sreenshot4](https://raw2.github.com/konchunas/minicraft-psp/gh-pages/images/screenshot4.png)
  Invertory menu

Downloads
===========

If you are using Custom Firmware you should download unsigned version (just because it's 10 times smaller). 0.5 Mb. [minicraft_1.0.0_unsigned.zip](https://github.com/konchunas/minicraft-psp/raw/gh-pages/build/minicraft_1.0.0_unsigned.zip)

If you are using Official Firmware you should download signed version (just because you don't have other choice). 5 Mb. [minicraft_1.0.0_signed.zip](https://github.com/konchunas/minicraft-psp/raw/gh-pages/build/minicraft_1.0.0_signed.zip)

Installation
===========

Unpack downloaded archive to /PSP/GAME/ on your memory card and launch "Minicraft" from XMB
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
